description: A Price Floors object which is parsed and used to enforce dynamic floors depending on the properties of the json
title: Price Floors Enforcement

schema.description: Defines the schema of the rules

fields.description: The list of fields to be used for matching criteria of a bid response with a price floor

delimiter.description: The character used to differentiate the fields inside a single rule

values.description: A object with key : value pairs which constitutes a rule and floor

currency.description: The three digit Currency Code which the floors are provided in

modelVersion.description: The floor modeling name to be used for tracking

skipRate.description: The skip rate as to which flooring will be 'turned off' for a given auction

default.description: The default floor to use if no entry in the value matches a bid response
